name: anki-chess-opening-trainer
description: This is the source code repository for the [Anki](https://apps.ankiweb.net/)-add-on "[Chess Opening Trainer](https://ankiweb.net/shared/info/705507113)". Anki is a popular, open-source flashcard application.  The add-on takes a collection of chess games and creates flashcards from it, helping you in building up an opening repertoire.
